      Fields in ru.bit.torrent with type parameters of type Peer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Peer> Tracker.peers
      Maps to a list of dictionaries corresponding to peers, each of which contains the keys peer id , IP , and port , which map to the peer's self-selected ID, IP address or DNS name as a string, and port number, respectively.
      java.util.ArrayList<Peer> Manager.peers
      The list of valid peers (currently RUBT11) that have a piece of the file we're trying to download.
      Methods in ru.bit.torrent that return Peer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Iterates through peer list and determines the peer with the slowest upload speed.

      static boolean Tracker.containsPeer(java.util.ArrayList<Peer> peerList, Peer peer)
      Looks thru array list to see if the specified peer's ID has a match; returns true if we have the peer in the list and false otherwise.

      This method takes a message sent by a peer, and reacts to it depending on message type.
      private void PerformanceAnalyzer.unchokeRandom(Peer dontUnchoke)
      From a pool of currently choked peers, choose one to unchoke.
